description: This file defines the RestaurantAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Restaurant objects in an Android application. It manages view creation, data binding, and user interactions such as favoriting restaurants.

classes.name: RestaurantAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Restaurant objects, including visual elements like rating, tags, and favorite status, with support for item interaction callbacks.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to item view components such as banner, name, tags, rating, eta, and favorite toggle.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates the ViewHolder for individual list items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds restaurant data to the ViewHolder, handling UI updates and user interactions.
